column4: not risky, you just won't reap the full benefits of the ext4 filesystem
IMHO you should wait for 9.10 and do a clean format

yeah, I've always had this question. So okay, I've got my files, Music, Documents, etc, which I can easily back up. But what about the other things? My firefox bookmarks? Pidgin logs? Compiz settings? Is there an easy way to move all this stuff into another system without copying the whole /home?
